channel.title: Innerhtml (snipit) (added my attempt too)

item.title: Innerhtml (snipit) (added my attempt too)
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

well i found a base code and changed it so it has more options i thought this will go well with a image based site so you dont have to reload all them images

<script type="text/javascript">
function changehome(){
	document.getElementById('home').innerHTML = 'this is the shit on homepage';
}
function changeclanstuff(){
	document.getElementById('home').innerHTML = 'this is where clan shit goes';
}
function changemusic(){
	document.getElementById('home').innerHTML = 'music ftw!';
}
</script>
<p><b id='home'>this is the shit on homepage</b> </p> 
<input type='button' onclick='changehome()' value='home'/>
<input type='button' onclick='changeclanstuff()' value='clan stuff'/>
<input type='button' onclick='changemusic()' value='music ftw'/>

here is what i came up with

<html><head><title>Home | Tom</title>
</head>
<body bgcolor="000000">
<TABLE BORDER="0" align="left" width="50%" bgcolor="ffffff">
<TR><TD ALIGN="center">

<script type="text/javascript">
function changehome(){
	document.getElementById('home').innerHTML = 'gittis vel, elementum ut, aliquet non, risus. Duis tincidunt urna sodales diam. Cras dolor. Fusce id mi vitae felis rhoncus sodales. Integer eget mauris quis nibh molestie vehicula. Vestibulum pharetra purus. Morbi ultricies convallis tortor. Aliquam erat volutpat. Integer euismod fermentum nisl. Donec malesuada mauris sit amet mi.';
}
function changeclanstuff(){
	document.getElementById('home').innerHTML = 'nec fermentum quam eros quis neque. Nulla malesuada sem et lacus. Mauris erat lectus, ultricies non, bibendum tristique, dictum id, libero. Praesent convallis lorem eget leo accumsan mattis. Integer enim turpis';
}
function changemusic(){
	document.getElementById('home').innerHTML = 'Vivamus diam sem, ultricies et, porttitor nec, commodo sit amet, leo. Cras massa ligula, ullamcorper sed, pulvinar a, elementum sed, urna. Suspendisse tortor lorem, sagittis vel, elementum ut, aliquet non, risus. Duis tincidunt urna sodales diam. Cras dolor. Fusce id mi vitae felis rhoncus sodales. Integer eget mauris quis nibh molestie vehicula. Vestibulum pharetra purus. Morbi ultricies convallis tortor. Aliquam erat volutpat. Integer euismod fermentum nisl. Donec malesuada mauris sit amet mi.';
}
</script>
<p><b id='home'>gittis vel, elementum ut, aliquet non, risus. Duis tincidunt urna sodales diam. Cras dolor. Fusce id mi vitae felis rhoncus sodales. Integer eget mauris quis nibh molestie vehicula. Vestibulum pharetra purus. Morbi ultricies convallis tortor. Aliquam erat volutpat. Integer euismod fermentum nisl. Donec malesuada mauris sit amet mi.</b> </p> 
<tr bgcolor="333333" border="0">
<input type='button' STYLE="font-family:sans-serif; font-size:large;
font-style:italic; background:#fff none; border:#333; color:#333; width:10em" onclick='changehome()' value='home'/>
<input type='button' STYLE="font-family:sans-serif; font-size:large;
font-style:italic; background:#fff none; border:#333; color:#333; width:10em" onclick='changeclanstuff()' value='clan stuff'/>
<input type='button' STYLE="font-family:sans-serif; font-size:large;
font-style:italic; background:#fff none; border:#333; color:#333; width:10em" onclick='changemusic()' value='music ftw'/>
</tr>
</TD></TR>
</TABLE>

</body>
</html>

its a bit messy but i know where everything is so yeah dont complain
